PrecisAppointment of The Honourable LORNE O. CLARKE of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to the position of Special Advsor to the Minister of Finance, as CHAIRPERSON of the PANEL ON CROWN SHARE ADJUSTMENT PAYMENTS, to hold office during pleasure.
